name: Zombie Spikes - Don't Squash The Infected Horde
name_original: Zombie Spikes - Don't Squash The Infected Horde
description:
Zombie Spikes is a twisted variation of the well-known "don't touch the spikes" genre.
Tap to jump, collect brain candies to unlock super cool characters. BUT whatever you, do not touch the spikes! If you do then you will see amazing blood splash effects when the spooky character dies! Download Zombies Love Spikes today. Perfect for Halloween. Boo :)

STORY
Those jerks in the government really did it this time. They started World War 3. At least no nukes were used. Still, maybe an even more terrible biological weapon known as Z Virus vector was brought to bear. Z virus is a deadly poison and a lot of people got sick and most died. Some became living dead (virus resistant)

The citizen who were not infected by the Z weapon, became trigger happy and started a zombie hunt. The undead started rising but 1 by 1 they got shot by the humans. The zombie massacre had started. The living made sure the dead became a roadkill by shooting them in the head.

Eventually they found other ways to slaughter the undead: Killer wall spikes! Those deadly walls really worked and the living dead started learning to avoid them. They don’t touch the spikes anymore!

The zombie massacre lasted exactly 28 days. After 28 days, the assault on the evil undead was over. The outbreak and horror was almost over. A large swath of land was marked as "dead zone" and protected with the deadly wall spike system. Anybody who dared crossing the spikes walls trigger an immediate shooting by the humans or got their skulls pierced.

You are the last rising undead!


HOW TO PLAY
- Tap anywhere on the screen to make the zombie head jump

- Dont touch the spikes! Stay away from the walls.

- Catch the brain candies to unlock spooky characters!

- Have fun :)

GAME FEATURES
- Simple one touch controls: touch to jump
- Easy to play, difficult to master 
- Bloody scary Z soundtrack!
- True addictive gameplay

Warning: Zombie Spikes is a fun and challenging game if you are into funny bloody games BUT be warned, it is also very addictive game!
